b'Revbahaf Wang-gug Jaegeon-soelgi': b'Three people are hiding out in a cabin by the foothills.  Van is the prince from the now-defunct Revbahaf Kingdom, Kona \xe2\x80\x93 his hand maiden, and Sian \xe2\x80\x93 his philosopher and tutor.  Chased by enemies, these three individuals earn the kindness of Aaron, who feeds them at the cabin.  By helping out with Aaron\xe2\x80\x99s chores, the former royal family learns to live a peaceful life getting by, rather than plotting a revenge on the neighboring country which invaded them. Together they try to rebuild the Kingdom of Revbahaf. \n\n(Source: Manhwa101)'
